#include<vector>
#include<string>
#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include <fstream>
#include<iomanip>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstdio>
#include<stack>
#include<cstring>
#include<map>
#include<set>
#include<queue>  
using namespace std;
#define MOD 100000007
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
	int T;
	int n;
	cin>>T;
	while(T--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		if(n%49==0&&n%343!=0)
			cout<<"YES"<<endl;
		else
			cout<<"NO"<<endl;
	}
	//system("pause");
	return 0;
}
